name: Baldi originally wore a blue shirt.
name_original: Baldi originally wore a blue shirt.
description:
Hi again. There's this mod called baldi originally wore a blue shirt mod. It's a mod where baldi used to wear a blue shirt and if you look at the wiki you can tell. I wanna make it easier for everyone and me to play mods that have rar files. Let me know if you want any rar files to be re-uploaded to zip files. ;)

< Credits >

CadenisCaden for the original mod

Me for re-uploading!

(WARNING: THIS MOD CONTAINS SWEARS SO BE-CAREFUL)

Original mod: https://gamejolt.com/games/BlueBaldiWHOA/772786
